Home » 40P16 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
93 Sanidassanattika, Niyataduka
Sanidassanattika, Niyataduka
144.
342Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ niyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha…pe…  avigate cha.
343Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
<< 92 Sanidassanattika, Niyyānikadukaup94 Sanidassanattika, Sauttaraduka >>
